title: Application to qualified foreign corporations
context: [ยง414D-322] Application to qualified foreign corporations. A foreign corporation authorized to transact business in this State on July 1, 2002 shall be subject to this chapter but is not required to obtain a new certificate of authority to transact business under this chapter. [L 2001, c 105, pt of ยง1] Revision Note &ldquo;July 1, 2002&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this chapter&rdquo;.
